Chapter 2226 - Chapter 2226: The Eighth And Ninth Laws

Chapter 2226: The eighth and ninth laws

Translator: 549690339

The Gu family’s path-understanding ancient tree was already 1000 meters tall. It was much more effective than his own path-understanding ancient tree. It was the most suitable place to comprehend the laws.

you guys can cultivate here. If you need anything, just send me a message!

Gu Xinghui left them a voice transmission jade talisman and disappeared with a flash.

The three of them headed toward the path-understanding ancient tree.

As they neared, they discovered that a few people were sitting cross-legged under the path-understanding ancient tree, cultivating.

It was obvious that they were from the Gu family.

Lu Ming finally understood why Gu yingchong could control four types of laws at such a young age. Two of them had even reached the second level. It definitely had a lot to do with the path-understanding ancient tree.

Someone in the Gu family sensed the arrival of the three of them. He opened his eyes and looked at the three of them in surprise.

It was because he did not know Lu Ming and the other two.

However, he was only surprised and didn’t say much.

This was because this was the Gu family’s Secret place. Without the Gu family’s higher-ups leading the way, no one would be able to find it.

Obviously, Lu Ming, dandan, and Mu Lan were able to come in because they were brought here by the Gu family’s higher-ups. Since it was the Gu family’s higher-ups who brought them here, he naturally would not say anything.

Nodding at Lu Ming and the other two, the person closed his eyes and continued cultivating.

“You two can cultivate here. I’m going to find a place to enter seclusion and break through to the true Emperor realm!”

Dandan said.

“I hope you break through soon. Otherwise, when I become a saint Emperor, 1’11 catch up to you very soon!”

Lu Ming said with a smile.

“In your dreams, you think you can catch up to me?”

Dandan pouted unhappily, then her figure flashed and she disappeared in an instant.

Lu Ming and Mu Lan went to the path-understanding ancient tree. They each found a bluestone and sat cross-legged on it.

The Dao Comprehension ancient tree was thousands of meters tall and extremely huge. Great DAOs surrounded its branches and leaves. It was very useful for comprehending nomological laws or divine power techniques here.

1 have to comprehend nine types of laws, three types of ultimate laws, and six types of King path laws. I’m still missing one type of ultimate law and one type of King path law. Which two should I comprehend?”

Lu Ming started to think.

if it’s a king path law, why don’t 1 comprehend the penetration law!

Lu Ming’s heart stirred.

The law of penetration had an amazing penetrative power. If he could comprehend it, his attack power would increase a lot.

Furthermore, the six-feathered divine wings that dandan had passed on to Lu Ming contained six types of laws. Besides the array Dao law, the alchemy Dao law, and the equipment Dao law, the penetration law was also one of them.

After comprehending the penetration law, one’s body would be able to fly through all obstacles. The increase in speed was also very shocking, so it was included in the six-feathered divine wings.

The six-feathered divine wings ‘power would also increase exponentially after comprehending the penetration law.

After setting the king path law, he had to decide which supreme law to comprehend.

Of the remaining eight ultimate maxims, Lu Ming had the highest hopes for the law of fate.

This was because the laws of fate were indeed incomparably profound and powerful.

However, the law of fate had an extremely high requirement for one’s talent, and it was also the most difficult to cultivate.

Lu Ming thought for a while and shook his head. He ruled out the law of fate, now that I have the chaos and death laws, I’m not weak in terms of attack. The next law doesn’t necessarily have to increase its attack power. It’s also very important to increase its defense or vitality!

“Then, the life law!”

In the end, Lu Ming made the decision to study the life law.

Lu Xiangxiang had a body of life, so Lu Ming was much more familiar with the life laws.

also, once one grasped the life law, their vitality would become extremely astonishing. Even if they suffered some fatal injuries, they would be able to quickly recover, greatly increasing their ability to survive.

For the next two types of laws, Lu Ming decided to comprehend the life law and the penetration law.

Closing his eyes, Lu Ming’s mind became empty. His mind and spirit became one with the heaven and earth, capturing the fluctuations of the law.

penetrate, penetrate everything, nothing can stop it…

Lu Ming murmured. He was enlightened.

As Lu Ming comprehended more and more laws, he had more and more experience in comprehending the laws. His comprehension became more and more efficient.

In just a few days, he had already grasped the basics of the penetration law.

Half a month later, Lu Ming successfully comprehended the life law.

Now, he had already mastered nine types of nomological laws. What he needed to do now was to increase the maturity of his nomological laws.

The laws of pill Dao, the laws of equipment Dao, the laws of penetration, and the laws of life.

Now, Lu Ming still had four types of laws that had not reached the completion of the first realm. However, he had already mastered about 90% of the alchemy and equipment Dao laws.

Lu Ming focused on the four types of laws.

In the blink of an eye, half a year had passed.

On this day, there was thunder and lightning in the distance. Lu Ming, who was cultivating, and the people of the Gu family all opened their eyes.

“Someone became a monarch and underwent the monarch tribulation!”

Someone from the Gu family murmured.

“Senior Sister Mu Lan is about to become a divine Emperor!”

Lu Ming revealed a smile.

Mu Lan had received the inheritance of a peerless expert. The inheritance process had lasted for five years. In these five years, Mu Lan’s cultivation had soared to the limit of Emperor-to-be before it stopped.

Mu Lan was just a step away from becoming a saint Emperor.

Now, after more than half a year of accumulation and polishing, Mu Lan had finally overcome the bottleneck and transcended the Tribulation to become a divine Emperor.

Lu Ming took a step forward and stood not far away from Mu Lan.

Mu Lan’s entire body was covered in a layer of blood-red light, which turned into streams of attacks to resist the heavenly Tribulation.

It seemed that Mu Lan was still quite relaxed. Not long after, Mu Lan successfully transcended the heavenly Tribulation.

BOOM!

At this moment, a shocking change occurred within Mu Lan’s body. It was the evolution of her Saint heart. Her Saint energy had turned into World Energy, and a faint Emperor’s might emanated from her body.

Half an hour later, Mu Lan’s aura finally stabilized and she had officially entered the Martial Emperor realm.

“Congratulations Senior Sister, you’ve proven your Dao and become an Emperor!”

Lu Ming stepped forward and congratulated him.

Mu Lan looked at Lu Ming, her face filled with joy.”l believe in Junior Brother, you will become a saint Emperor very soon!”

“Not bad, little girl. You’ve become a divine Emperor so quickly. It seems that you’re really suitable for the cultivation path of that fellow, Xue Xiu!”

A voice was heard, followed by a flash of light and dandan’s figure appeared.

“Dandan, you’ve also broken through?”

Lu Ming sized up dandan and asked curiously.

“Of course, what kind of existence am 1? I’ll soon break through to the great emperor realm, then the heavenly Emperor realm, and finally surpass the past and break into the Supreme realm, hahaha!”

Dandan laughed proudly, as if she had thought of a beautiful future, her eyes shining.

“This fellow…”

Lu Ming despised him but he was happy for him.

Dandan laughed for a while. Lu Ming, come, come. Let’s spar. Let’s see how your comprehension of the laws has been going.

“You’re a true Emperor now. If I spar with you, wouldn’t I just be abused?”

Lu Ming pursed his lips and rejected immediately.

Dandan was the World Turtle, one of the top ten war beasts. Furthermore, his memories had completely recovered and he had mastered many types of nomological laws. Although he had just broken through to the true Emperor realm, his combat strength was definitely very shocking..
